ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: RG1 In general, how important are your religious or spiritual beliefs in your daily life?
Notes: 1=Very important;2=Somewhat important;3=Not very important;4=Not at all important; -8= DK AND REFUSAL

ElementDescription: RG2 How often in the last year did you attend religious services?
Notes: 1=More than once a week;2=Once a week;3=A few times a month;4=Once a month;5=Less than once a month;6=Never; -8= DK AND REFUSAL

ElementDescription: RG3 To what extent are you conscious of some religious goal or purpose in life which serves to give you direction?
Notes: 1=Very much;2=Somewhat;3=A little bit;4=Not at all conscious of a religious goal or purpose in life; -8= DK AND REFUSAL

ElementDescription: RG4 When you have problems or difficulties in your family, work, or personal life, how often do you seek spiritual comfort?
RG5 Other than at mealtime, how often do you pray to a higher power privately?
Notes: 1=Several times a day;2=Daily;3=On occasion;4=Rarely;5=Never; -8= DK AND REFUSAL

ElementDescription: RG6 How satisfied are you with your spiritual life?
Notes: 1=Very dissatisfied;2=Somewhat dissatisfied;3=Neutral;4=Somewhat satisfied;5=Very satisfied; -8= DK AND REFUSAL

ElementDescription: RG7 Do you believe in God or in a universal spirit?
RG8 Have you been born again, that is, had a turning point in your life when you committed yourself to Jesus Christ?
Notes: 1=NO;5=YES;6=No, not a Christian; -8= DK AND REFUSAL

ElementDescription: RG9 Please say whether you agree or disagree with the following statement: The Bible is the actual word of God and is to be taken literally, word for word.
IntType TYPE OF INTERVIEW: How was this interview administered?
Notes: 2=In person; 3=By telephone; 4=By proxy; -8= DK AND REFUSAL

ElementDescription: QS RATE ACCURACY OF CODES THROUGHOUT SSAGA-IV
Notes: 1=NO DIFFICULTY; 2=SOME PROBLEMS, BUT MOST RATINGS REASONABLY ACCURATE; 3=MAJOR DIFFICULTY IN CONDUCTING EXAM; 4=IMPOSSIBLE TO RATE WITH ANY CONFIDENCE; -8= DK AND REFUSAL
